akn:section.akn:heading: Treatment of Trust Fund under certain laws.

akn:content.akn:p: Internal Revenue Code. — For purposes of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986:

ERISA. — For purposes of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the benefits provided by the Trust Fund shall be treated as benefits provided under a governmental plan maintained by the District of Columbia.

Application of certain future amendments to Internal Revenue Code. — To the extent that any provision of subpart A of part I of subchapter D of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (26 U.S.C. § 401 et seq.) is amended August 5, 1997, such provision as amended shall apply to the Trust Fund only to the extent the Secretary determines that application of the provision as amended is consistent with the administration of this chapter.
